Introduction

Hwasumok, formerly known as Soopia, is a South Korean singer under OUI Entertainment. She was the leader and main vocalist of the girl group Tiny-G and subunit Tiny-G M as J.Min. On August 23, 2021, she made her solo debut with the digital single "If You Like This Song".

On April 28th of 2023 she took to her Instagram to announce that she would be going by the name Hwasumok.
